data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كَانَ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: to do something, He did it, the suffering or receiving the effect of an act, to commit, a doing, to do a deed, a custom/habit/manner/wont.
data.sentence: The word مَفْعُولًا comes from the root ف ع ل and is associated with the meanings: to do something, He did it, the suffering or receiving the effect of an act, to commit, a doing, to do a deed, a custom/habit/manner/wont.

data.meanings: to promise, give one's word, threaten, promise good, threaten (depending on context).. . Wa'ada act (pr.f 3rd. p. m. sing.): He promised.. Wa'adta (prf. 2nd. p. m. sing.): Thou promised.. Wa'adtu (prf. 1st. p. m. sing.): I promised.. Wa'aduu (prf. 3rd. p. plu.): They promised.. Wa'adna  (prf. 1st. p. m.): We promise.. Ya'idu (imp. 3rd. p. m. sing.): He promises, threatens.. 'Id (prt. m. sing.): promise.. Wu'ida (pp. 3rd. p. sing.): Has been promised.. Yuu'aduuna (pip. 3rd. p. plu.): They were threatened.. Tu'aduuna  (pip. 2nd. p. plu.) You are promised, are threatened.. Mau'uud (pic. pact. n. sing.): Promised.. Tuu'aduuna  (imp. 2nd. p. m. plu. II.): (Punishment which) you are promised.. Waa'adna (imp. 1st. p. plu. III.): We made an appointment, a promise.. Tawaa'dtum (prf. 2nd. p. m. plu.): Ye have mutually appointed.. Laa Tawaa'duu  (prt. neg. m.plu.): Do not appoint mutually; Make no agreement or promises.. Wa'iid (act. 2nd. pic. m. sing.): Threatening; Threat; Warning.. Mau'idan (n. place): Time; Place or time of the fulfilment of a prediction; Promise or warning; Appointment for meeting a promise.. Mii'aad  (for Miu'aad; n. place): Time; Time or place of the promise.
data.sentence: The word وَعْدُهُ comes from the root و ع د and is associated with the meanings: to promise, give one's word, threaten, promise good, threaten (depending on context).. . Yuu'aduuna (pip. 3rd. p. plu.): They were threatened.. Tu'aduuna  (pip. 2nd. p. plu.) You are promised, are threatened.. Mau'uud (pic. pact. n. sing.): Promised.. Tuu'aduuna  (imp. 2nd. p. m. plu. II.): (Punishment which) you are promised.. Waa'adna (imp. 1st. p. plu. III.): We made an appointment, a promise.. Tawaa'dtum (prf. 2nd. p. m. plu.): Ye have mutually appointed.. Laa Tawaa'duu  (prt. neg. m.plu.): Do not appoint mutually; Make no agreement or promises.. Wa'iid (act. 2nd. pic. m. sing.): Threatening; Threat; Warning.. Mau'idan (n. place): Time; Place or time of the fulfilment of a prediction; Promise or warning; Appointment for meeting a promise.. Mii'aad  (for Miu'aad; n. place): Time; Time or place of the promise.

data.meanings: to be high/lofty, raised, name, attribute. samawat - heights/heavens/rain, raining clouds. ismun - mark of identification by which one is recognised. It is a derivation of wsm (pl. asma). ism - stands for a distinguishing mark of a thing, sometimes said to signify its reality.
data.sentence: The word السَّمَاءُ comes from the root س م و and is associated with the meanings: to be high/lofty, raised, name, attribute. samawat - heights/heavens/rain, raining clouds. ismun - mark of identification by which one is recognised. It is a derivation of wsm (pl. asma). ism - stands for a distinguishing mark of a thing, sometimes said to signify its reality.

data.meanings: to create out of nothing, cleave/split/crack/break, be broken into pieces, cleave asunder, begin to create. fitrat - natural disposition or constitution with which a child is created. The faculty of knowing God and capability of accepting the religion of truth, religion. fatir -creator, one of the names of Allah. futur - crack/flaw. munfatirun - split one, cloven one, one rent asunder.
data.sentence: The word مُنْفَطِرٌ comes from the root ف ط ر and is associated with the meanings: to create out of nothing, cleave/split/crack/break, be broken into pieces, cleave asunder, begin to create. fitrat - natural disposition or constitution with which a child is created. The faculty of knowing God and capability of accepting the religion of truth, religion. fatir -creator, one of the names of Allah. futur - crack/flaw. munfatirun - split one, cloven one, one rent asunder.
